title: A can complete a work in 12 days with a working of 8 hours per day. B can complete the same work in 8 days when working 10 hours a day. If A and B work together, working 8 hours a day, the work can be completed in --- days? - Quora

A does the work in 12*8 = 96 hours. A does (1/96)th of the work in 1 hour. B does the same work in 8*10 = 80 hours. B does (1/80)th of the work in 1 hour. A and B, together do (1/96)+(1/80) = (80+96)/(96*80) = 176/(96*80)th of the work in 1 hour. So A and B will do the whole work in (96*80)/176 = 43.64 hours. Thus if A and B work for 8 hours a day the two of them will complete the same work in 43.64/8 = 5.45 days.
